get.description: Get the details of a specific review by Google Id / Business Id or Google Place Id and Review Author Id.

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: The Business Id of the business for which the review belongs. Accepts google_id / business_id or place_id. Examples: 0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow

parameters.name: review_author_id
parameters.description: Review author id (i.e review author_id field). In addition, batching of up to 20 Review Author Ids is supported in a single request using a comma separated list (e.g. review_author_id=id1,id2).

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes (Alpha-2 code). Default: us

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes . Default: en

get.description: Search businesses in a specific geographic area defined by a center coordinate point and zoom level. To see it in action, make a query on Google Maps, wait for the results to show, move the map or change the zoom and click \

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query / keyword

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of the center coordinate point of the area to search in.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude of the center coordinate point of the area to search in.

parameters.name: zoom
parameters.description: Zoom level on which to make the search (the search area / viewport is determined by lat, lng and zoom on a 1000x1000 screen).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of businesses to return. Default: 20 Allowed values: 1-500

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes . Default: en

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes (Alpha-2 code). Default: us

parameters.name: subtypes
parameters.description: Find businesses with specific subtypes, specified as a comma separated list of types (business categories). For the complete list of types, see https://daltonluka.com/blog/google-my-business-categories. Examples: Plumber,Carpenter,Electrician Night club,Dance club,Bar,Pub

parameters.name: extract_emails_and_contacts
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of business fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: business_id,type,phone_number,full_address

parameters.name: X-User-Agent
parameters.description: Device type for the search. Default desktop.

get.description: Returns place/address, business and query predictions for text-based geographic queries.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Return results biased to a particular region. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code). Default: us

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2 . Default: en

parameters.name: coordinates
parameters.description: Geographic coordinates of the location from which the query is applied - recommended to use so that results are biased towards this location. Defaults to some central location in the region (see the region parameter).

get.description: Get extra details about a business photo - caption, owner name and avatar, and more information. Supports batching of up to 20 Photo Ids.

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: The Business Id of the business for which the photo belongs. Accepts google_id / business_id or place_id. Examples: 0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo Id of the photo to fetch. In addition, batching of up to 20 Photo Ids is supported in a single request using a comma separated list (e.g. photo_id=id1,id2).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Specify the cursor obtained from the previous request to get the next of result page (use for pagination).

parameters.name: lng

get.description: Get business photos by Business Id.

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Unique Business Id. Accepts google_id / business_id or place_id. Examples: 0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of business photos to return. Default: 20 Allowed values: 1-100

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Specify the cursor obtained from the previous request to get the next of result page (use for pagination).

parameters.name: is_video
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes (Alpha-2 code). Default: us

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of review fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: type,photo_url

get.description: Search local businesses on Google Maps with an option to pull emails and social profile links from their website (see the `extract_emails_and_contacts` parameter below).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query / keyword Examples: Plumbers near New-York, USA Bars in 94102, USA

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of businesses to return. Default: 20 Allowed values: 1-500

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of the coordinates point from which the query is applied - recommended to use so that results are biased towards this location. Defaults to some central location in the region (see the region parameter).

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude of the coordinates point from which the query is applied - recommended to use so that results are biased towards this location. Defaults to some central location in the region (see the region parameter).

parameters.name: zoom
parameters.description: Zoom level on which to make the search (the viewport is determined by lat, lng and zoom). Default: 13

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes . Default: en

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes (Alpha-2 code). Default: us

parameters.name: subtypes
parameters.description: Find businesses with specific subtypes, specified as a comma separated list of types (business categories). For the complete list of types, see https://daltonluka.com/blog/google-my-business-categories. Examples: Plumber,Carpenter,Electrician Night club,Dance club,Bar,Pub

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: business_status
parameters.description: Find businesses with specific status, specified as a comma separated list of the following values: OPEN, CLOSED_TEMPORARILY, CLOSED. Examples: OPEN CLOSED_TEMPORARILY,CLOSED

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of business fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: business_id,type,phone_number,full_address

parameters.name: extract_emails_and_contacts
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: X-User-Agent
parameters.description: Device type for the search. Default desktop.

get.description: Get business reviews by Business Id with pagination support.

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Unique Business Id. Accepts google_id / business_id or place_id. Examples: 0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of business reviews to return. Default: 20 Allowed values: 1-1000

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor value from the previous response to get the next set of results (scrolling / pagination).

parameters.name: translate_reviews
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return reviews matching a text query.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: How to sort the reviews in the results. Default: most_relevant Allowed values: most_relevant, newest, highest_ranking, lowest_ranking

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of review fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: review_id,review_text,rating

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes (Alpha-2 code). Default: us

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Set the language of the results. For a list of supported language codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes . Default: en

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of business reviews to return. Default: 20 Allowed values: 1-1000
